translations.en:
: ** :walking: While walking through a village, you notice a group of people. Up close, you quickly notice a hanging in progress. After some discussion, you learn this person is sentenced to death for "words contrary to the values of the church"

:money_with_wings: Steal from the audience.
:punch: Stand in the way to prevent the man from dying.
:walking: Continue on your journey peacefully

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
